# go-imgbb
Golang package for ImgBB image hosting

## Installation
```bash
go get github.com/mococa/go-imgbb
```

## Example

```golang
package main

import (
  "fmt"
  "log"
  
  imgbb "github.com/mococa/go-imgbb"
)

func main() {
  imgbb_key := "2d6be3a136b331830b377bfe5951bc03"
  img_base64 := ""
  
  image, err := imgbb.Upload(imgbb_key, img_base64)
  if err != nil {
    log.Fatal(err)
  }
  
  fmt.Println(image.Data.DisplayURL) // returns https://i.ibb.co/SBbNB7X/6a9eb1a6b2bd.jpg
}
```
